body.name: HomGarden 6.6lbs Capacity Mini Washing Machine for Compact Laundry, Portable Single Translucent Tub Washer with Timer Control and Spin Cycle Basket
features: 【Space Saving】- Overall dimensions: 11.42” x 11.81” x 20.47” (L x W x H). Only 11.2lbs, light weight and small shape offers great flexibility. Ideal for dorms, apartments, condos, motor homes, RV's, camping or anywhere with limited space
【Timer Control】- With compact 2 in 1 designed and timer control settings for single tub washing machine with spin basket up to 10 minutes (wash) and 5 minutes (spin) to meet your different needs

【User-friendly Design】- The clear lid makes you easy to see and monitor the water condition. Featured a drain hose to easily drain out dirty water.Detachable spin basket design, you just need to install it when you spin your clothes, and spin program will not damage your clothes

【Compact & Powerful】- The capacity of total laundry up to 7.9lbs .The small size with low power consumption can save much energy. Features an automatic rinse cycle to remove soap, and leave your clothing super clean

【Easy Operation】- This mini single tub washing machine is made of high quality PP plastic material body, ensures the machine will never be rust eaten. Simply put in your load of clothes, fill with water, set the timer, then start washing
body.description: Features: ◆2-in-1 design , can be used as a washing machine and dryer . ◆Light weight and easy to move,takes up very little space .Perfect for your limited space such as dorms, apartments, condos, motor homes, RV's. ◆Features timer control ,you can adjust the time of washing clothes to meet your various needs. ◆High-strength plastic material, durable and will not change color, good toughness is not easy to deformation. ◆Clear lid design allows you to see and monitor the water condition easily . ◆Our mini washing machine is very quiet when it is running, it saves more time and energy. Specifications:Color: BlueMaterial: Durable PP PlasticOverall Dimensions: 11.42” x 11.81” x 20.47” (L x W x H)Washing Capacity: 4.4LBSSpinning Capacity: 2.2 LBSTimer: Up to 15 minutes Drain Hose Length: 14.96”Inlet Hose Length: 82.67” Power Cord Length: 70.07”Net Weight: 11.02 LBS Package Included: 1 x Single Tub Washing Machine 1 x Inlet Hose 1 x Spin Basket 1 x Instruction

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #2,593 in Appliances (See Top 100 in Appliances) #320 in Portable Clothes Washing Machines

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Hello: Bought this machine couple weeks ago. Works great! I live in an old Class C RV. Space is limited, fits perfectly in my shower stall. Have done about 5-6 loads so far, no problems. I wring my close by hand before and after the spin cycle, don't have to it's just what I choose. Drain hose could be a little longer, but works fine for me. Line dry...my choice again. I am on a limited budget. The price for this was perfect and I have already saved money and gas by not going to the Laundromat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not a good washing machine
reviews.reviewText: I will start by saying that I love little washer in the beginning. However after a month I started realizing that there was tiny holds in my clothing, at that time not realizing that it was the machine.I continued using the machine only to realize that the holds were multiplying and that every piece of clothing with elastic in the waist was stretching out e.g. PjsThe third problem is that the lint that my clothing collects just kept getting worse, I had just bought some clothing pieces and all of them were ruin because of lint stuck on the material .When you are washing a full load, first of all the hose with the machine don't work, I had to buy my own which was not a problem. Then what I found out is that while washing the clothes they got tangle up with each other and got stretch out to the limit then made all the holds that I have been talking about.Now i have a small washer I wish I could use , i don't use it anymore, my clothes is ruin because of it.I bought this washer because I suffer with health issues that give me much pain and problem by going and do my laundry in a laundry mat. Now I just regret spending my money on this. In my opinion if you only need to wash 2 piece of clothing once a month then go for it but if you are someone who will buy this washer thinking I have a machine that I can now use daily or weekly, you are buying the wrong machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does the job...
reviews.reviewText: I like my portable washing machine this is my second one but my other one was from a different company. My old one I accidentally broke was a little better than the one I have now. It washed my clothes a little better, I was able to wash more clothes and my new one really shouldn't say it has a spin cycle because it does nothing I still have to ring my clothes out which is fine but my old washer had a great spin cycle. They look the same but definitely don't work the same, but like I said it gets the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I only recommend this washer for a family of 3 max
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I loved this washer, it's works better then my 3.0 cu ft magic chef (washing part) , it's small so I only recommend this washer for a family of 3 max because it is small still haven't tested the spin cycle but read that it's not good at it, does not bother me because I have panda spin dryer. It is noisy but not terrible, bought this for undergarments but looks that it will not work for that because it's to powerful for it. But great washer machine so far so good, hope will last.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Mejor compra que está ninguna. Lava a la perfección y secado también a veces puede ser que se mueva pero solo es cuestión de acomodar bien la ropa y listo. La utilizo con todo. Ropa de mi bebé mis sábanas y toallas. Excelente material

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working after second use.
reviews.reviewText: This is my second use after purchase. Half the way through my second wash cycle, it stopped washing. You can clearly hear it trying, but the inside bottom circle plate that washes back and forth no longer turns. It was certainly not packed at all. Mostly water. I really had high hopes for this devise but it failed only after the second use. Very disappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Love this little washer. Came in handy when our washer went out. Should have splurged on the one with the separate spinner but this little guy does the job good enough as a big washer. Real good investment. I love it. I have definitely recommended this and bragged about it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cheap unit that isn’t durable
reviews.reviewText: Purchased 8 months ago and it worked fine. Now it leaks from the bottom and the motor is apparently dying as the agitation is fairly weak.
